body: For the past 5 hours i have been trying to log on to minecraft... It always shows "Play offline" So i try it, to play on a server... It crashes all the time. If you have a similar problem, hope for the best :)
body_tagged: For the past 5 hours i have been trying to log on to minecraft... It always shows "Play offline" So i try it, to play on a server... It crashes all the time. If you have a similar problem, hope for the best :)
title: Minecraft is down?

replies.body: Minecraft.net and the Multiplayer session service is down. You can check to see the statuses of the game at help.mojang.com. Keep updated there. They're probably having a maintenance break or something, so don't be too worried.
replies.body_tagged: Minecraft.net and the Multiplayer session service is down. You can check to see the statuses of the game at help.mojang.com. Keep updated there. They're probably having a maintenance break or something, so don't be too worried.

replies.body: The same for me i think the entire minecraft network is down, at least on the east coast, or they could just be updating to 1.8

replies.body: GUYS 1.8 IS NOT COMING OUT! If 1.8 is coming out where is the pre-release? Plus if 1.8 Would come out we still wouldn't be able to play avicus. The plugins and stuff need to be updated. https://twitter.com/MojangSupport/statuses/494176651475828738 He isn't saying that 1.8 is coming out anyways. Its saying the Multiplayer session is down.
